text: Love for Sale is the second collaboration album between American singers Tony Bennett and Lady Gaga. It was released on October 1, 2021, through Columbia and Interscope Records. It is also Bennett's final album before retirement. The album contains covers of Cole Porter songs. The first single, "I Get a Kick Out of You", was released on August 6, 2021, followed by the second single, "Love for Sale", on September 17, 2021. The album entered the US Billboard 200 album chart at number eight and entered at the top of the Traditional Jazz Albums chart, becoming Bennett's fifteenth chart-topper on the latter chart. == Track listing == Lengths taken from Target CD import. ==Charts== Chart performance of Love for Sale Chart (2021) Peak position US Traditional Jazz Albums (Billboard) 1 == References == Category:2021 albums Category:Jazz albums Category:Lady Gaga albums
title: Love for Sale (album)
